body:
What is the difference between destination and placement of the resource? It was not clear to me from the docstring:

> ‘destination’ : (optional) path where to move the resource. This path must be relative to the main package stage area.
‘placement’ : (optional) gives the possibility to fine tune how the resource is moved into the main package stage area.

I tried to use `placement=xy/ab`, but the `xy/ab` folder in the root of the package is empty.
title: difference between resource destination and placement
